filters_applied: Low severity: keep only if mapped to vulnerability type

findings.description:
Reentrancy in ModifierBank.airDrop() (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_038.sol#9-11):
	External calls:
	- supportsToken() (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_038.sol#9)
		- require(bool)(keccak256()(abi.encodePacked(Nu Token)) == Bank(msg.sender).supportsToken()) (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_038.sol#15)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenBalance[msg.sender] += 20 (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_038.sol#10)
	ModifierBank.tokenBalance (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_038.sol#5) can be used in cross function reentrancies:
	- ModifierBank.airDrop() (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_038.sol#9-11)
	- ModifierBank.hasNoBalance() (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_038.sol#19-22)
	- ModifierBank.tokenBalance (samples/ds/tier1/contracts/ds_t1_038.sol#5)
